name: Isis's Seven
description:
Isis's Seven

You play as the Goddess Isis's seven guardian scorpions in a future environment. Each scorpion only has one weapon. Upon death, the player/scorpion can revive as another of the seven... as, thus, use a new weapon.

---

BASIC Controls...

W-A-S-D - Movement

Space - Jump/Revive

Left Mouse Button - Fire

Escape - Quit

---

The idea for this game is very loosely based on Isis and the Seven Scorpions. As much as I tried, only two "scorpions" (player character) made it in the game in the form of weapons.

---

This game was made for the Godot Wild Jam #32. I attempted to make something I've never tried before... a FSP. I'm not very skilled in 3D game development and, while I tried to keep things simple, most things still did not make it into the game, unfortunately.

Please accept this game for what it is... a first attempt at trying a new skill set during a game jam.

Thank you!
- ObsidianBlk
